name: Generic Text Survival Game
description:
What is this?

This is the Generic Text Survival Game, made in Python. You survive by looking after your health, food, and water. When you feel that you are ready, you can collect gems and spend them to get food and water, just be sure to not go in debt.

How long can you survive?

Requirements?

You must have Python installed, you can download the latest version here: https://www.python.org/
